description.english: Claim existence and name the territory
description.french: Revendiquer l’existence et nommer le territoire
description.german: Beanspruche die Existenz und benenne das Gebiet
description.italian: Rivendica l'esistenza e dai un nome al territorio
description.polish: Zajmij terytorium i nadaj mu nazwę
description.portuguese: Reivindicar a existência e nomear o território
description.russian: Заявите о существовании и назовите территорию
description.schinese: 宣称存在，并为领地起名
description.spanish: Reclamar la existencia y nombrar el territorio
description.tchinese: 宣稱存在，並為領地起名

description.english: Build a throne and welcome the lord to take office
description.french: Construire un trône et accueillir le seigneur pour prendre ses fonctions
description.german: Errichte einen Thron und heiße den Lord willkommen, das Amt anzutreten
description.italian: Costruisci un trono e accogli il signore che prende servizio
description.polish: Zbuduj tron i powitaj lorda obejmującego urząd
description.portuguese: Construir um trono e receber o senhor para assumir o cargo
description.russian: Постройте трон и пригласите лорда занять должность
description.schinese: 建造王座，迎接领主到任
description.spanish: Construir un trono y dar la bienvenida al señor para asumir el cargo
description.tchinese: 建造王座，迎接領主到任

description.french: Récolter 1 000 citrouilles géantes
description.italian: Raccogli 1.000 zucche giganti
description.portuguese: Colher 1.000 abóboras gigantes
description.schinese: 累计收获1000个巨大的南瓜
description.spanish: Cosechar 1.000 calabazas gigantes
description.tchinese: 累計收穫1000個巨大的南瓜

description.french: Attraper 1 000 gros poissons
description.italian: Cattura 1.000 grossi pesci
description.portuguese: Pegar 1.000 peixes grandes
description.spanish: Atrapar 1.000 peces grandes

description.english: Mined 1 million iron ores in the mine
description.french: Extraire 1 million de minerais de fer dans la mine
description.german: Baue 1 Million Eisenerze in der Mine ab
description.italian: Estrai 1 milione di minerali di ferro nella miniera
description.polish: Wydobądź 1 milion rud żelaza w kopalni
description.portuguese: Minerar 1 milhão de minérios de ferro na mina
description.russian: Добыто 1 миллион железных руд в шахте
description.schinese: 在矿井中，累计开采出100万个铁矿
description.spanish: Extraer 1 millón de minerales de hierro en la mina
description.tchinese: 在礦井中，累計開採出100萬個鐵礦

description.french: Produire 100 000 fioles de potion de vie
description.italian: Produci 100.000 bottiglie di pozione della vita
description.portuguese: Produzir 100.000 frascos de poção de vida
description.schinese: 累计生产10万瓶生命药水
description.spanish: Producir 100.000 frascos de poción de vida
description.tchinese: 累計生產10萬瓶生命藥水

description.french: Récolter 1 000 œufs d’or
description.italian: Raccogli 1.000 uova d'oro
description.portuguese: Colher 1.000 ovos dourados
description.spanish: Cosechar 1.000 huevos de oro

description.english: Win 1 million silver coins from travelers through roulette
description.french: Gagner 1 million de pièces d’argent auprès des voyageurs grâce à la roulette
description.german: Gewinne 1 Million Silbermünzen von Reisenden durch Roulette
description.italian: Vinci 1 milione di monete d'argento dai viaggiatori tramite la roulette
description.polish: Wygraj 1 milion srebrnych monet od podróżników w ruletce
description.portuguese: Ganhar 1 milhão de moedas de prata de viajantes na roleta
description.russian: Выиграйте 1 миллион серебряных монет у путешественников через рулетку
description.schinese: 通过轮盘赢取旅客100万银币
description.spanish: Ganar 1 millón de monedas de plata de viajeros mediante la ruleta
description.tchinese: 通過輪盤贏取旅客100萬銀幣

description.english: Use beehives to harvest 10,000 honeys a year
description.french: Utiliser des ruches pour récolter 10 000 miels par an
description.german: Nutze Bienenstöcke, um 10.000 Honig im Jahr zu ernten
description.italian: Usa gli alveari per raccogliere 10.000 miele all'anno
description.portuguese: Usar colmeias para colher 10.000 méis por ano
description.russian: Используйте ульи, чтобы собирать 10 000 единиц мёда в год
description.schinese: 使用蜂箱，一年收获10000蜂蜜
description.spanish: Usar colmenas para cosechar 10.000 mieles al año
description.tchinese: 使用蜂箱，一年收穫10000蜂蜜

description.french: Brasser 100 000 spiritueux par an
description.italian: Produci 100.000 distillati all'anno
description.portuguese: Produzir 100.000 destilados por ano
description.spanish: Destilar 100.000 licores al año

description.french: Cuisiner 100 000 plats raffinés par an
description.italian: Cucina 100.000 piatti raffinati all'anno
description.portuguese: Cozinhar 100.000 pratos refinados por ano
description.spanish: Cocinar 100.000 comidas finas al año

description.english: A total of 100 dwarves lived to be over 100 years old
description.french: Un total de 100 nains ont vécu jusqu’à plus de 100 ans
description.italian: Un totale di 100 nani ha vissuto oltre i 100 anni
description.portuguese: Um total de 100 anões viveram mais de 100 anos
description.spanish: Un total de 100 enanos vivieron más de 100 años

description.english: The population of the territory's residential buildings reached 1,000 people
description.french: La population des bâtiments résidentiels du territoire atteint 1 000 personnes
description.german: Die Bevölkerung der Wohngebäude im Gebiet erreichte 1000 Personen
description.italian: La popolazione degli edifici residenziali del territorio ha raggiunto 1.000 persone
description.polish: Liczba mieszkańców budynków mieszkalnych na terytorium osiągnęła 1 000
description.portuguese: A população dos edifícios residenciais do território chegou a 1.000 pessoas
description.russian: Население жилых зданий территории достигло 1000 человек
description.spanish: La población de los edificios residenciales del territorio alcanzó las 1.000 personas

description.english: The inventory of fine foods reached 1 million
description.french: Le stock de plats raffinés atteint 1 million
description.german: Die Vorräte an Delikatessen erreichten 1 Million
description.italian: L'inventario dei cibi raffinati ha raggiunto 1 milione
description.portuguese: O estoque de pratos refinados chegou a 1 milhão
description.spanish: El inventario de comidas finas alcanzó 1 millón

description.french: Déposer 1 million à la banque
description.italian: Deposita 1 milione in banca
description.portuguese: Depositar 1 milhão no banco
description.spanish: Depositar 1 millón en el banco

description.french: Déposer 10 millions à la banque
description.italian: Deposita 10 milioni in banca
description.portuguese: Depositar 10 milhões no banco
description.spanish: Depositar 10 millones en el banco

description.english: Raise the average happiness of residents to 95
description.french: Élever le bonheur moyen des résidents à 95
description.german: Steigere die durchschnittliche Zufriedenheit der Bewohner auf 95
description.italian: Aumenta la felicità media dei residenti a 95
description.polish: Podnieś średni poziom szczęścia mieszkańców do 95
description.portuguese: Aumentar a felicidade média dos residentes para 95
description.russian: Повысить средний уровень счастья жителей до 95
description.schinese: 使居民的平均幸福度到达95
description.spanish: Elevar la felicidad promedio de los residentes a 95
description.tchinese: 使居民的平均幸福度到達95

description.english: Have residents of all races in the territory at the same time
description.french: Avoir des résidents de toutes les races dans le territoire en même temps
description.german: Habe Bewohner aller Rassen gleichzeitig im Gebiet
description.italian: Avere residenti di tutte le razze nel territorio allo stesso tempo
description.polish: Miej mieszkańców wszystkich ras na terytorium jednocześnie
description.portuguese: Ter residentes de todas as raças no território ao mesmo tempo
description.russian: Имейте жителей всех рас на территории одновременно
description.schinese: 在领地中，同时拥有所有种族的居民
description.spanish: Tener residentes de todas las razas en el territorio al mismo tiempo
description.tchinese: 在領地中，同時擁有所有種族的居民

description.french: Réaliser 10 000 collectes de surface
description.italian: Completa 10.000 raccolte superficiali
description.portuguese: Completar 10.000 coletas de superfície
description.spanish: Completar 10.000 recolecciones en la superficie

description.english: Use lord skills to control 500 skeletons Skeleton Warrior
description.french: Utiliser les compétences du seigneur pour contrôler 500 Guerriers Squelettes
description.german: Nutze die Fähigkeiten des Lords, um 500 Skelettkrieger zu kontrollieren
description.italian: Usa le abilità del signore per controllare 500 guerrieri scheletro
description.polish: Użyj umiejętności lorda, aby kontrolować 500 Wojowników Szkieletów
description.portuguese: Usar as habilidades do senhor para controlar 500 Guerreiros Esqueleto
description.russian: Используйте навыки лорда, чтобы контролировать 500 скелетов-воинов
description.schinese: 使用领主技能，控制500个骷髅战士
description.spanish: Usar las habilidades del señor para controlar 500 Guerreros Esqueleto
description.tchinese: 使用領主技能，控制500個骷髏戰士

description.english: Use the Three-Eyed Mage to control 100 soldiers in total
description.french: Utiliser le Mage à Trois Yeux pour contrôler un total de 100 soldats

description.spanish: Usar al Mago de Tres Ojos para controlar un total de 100 soldados
description.tchinese: 使用三眼法師，累計控制100個士兵

description.english: Rescue merchants or travelers 100 times in total
description.french: Sauver au total 100 marchands ou voyageurs

description.italian: Rescue mercanti o viaggiatori per un totale di 100 volte

description.english: Dig up 100 residents' tombstones in total
description.french: Déterrer un total de 100 tombes de résidents
description.german: Grabe insgesamt 100 Grabsteine von Bewohnern aus

description.english: Unlock all animals and collect all plant seeds
description.french: Débloquer tous les animaux et collecter toutes les graines de plantes

description.spanish: Desbloquear todos los animales y recolectar todas las semillas de plantas

description.english: Click the feedback button at the start of the game to submit a bug feedback or suggestion message to the developer
description.french: Cliquer sur le bouton de retour au début du jeu pour envoyer un bug ou une suggestion au développeur
description.german: Klicke im Spielstartmenü auf den Feedback-Button, um einen Bug oder Vorschlag an den Entwickler zu senden
description.italian: Clicca il pulsante di feedback all'inizio del gioco per inviare un bug o un suggerimento allo sviluppatore
description.polish: Kliknij przycisk opinii na początku gry, aby przesłać błąd lub sugestię do dewelopera
description.portuguese: Clicar no botão de feedback no início do jogo para enviar um relatório de erro ou sugestão ao desenvolvedor
description.russian: Нажмите кнопку обратной связи в начале игры, чтобы отправить отчёт об ошибке или предложение разработчику
description.schinese: 在游戏开始界面，点击反馈按钮，向开发者提交一条BUG反馈或建议信息
description.spanish: Hacer clic en el botón de comentarios al inicio del juego para enviar un informe de error o sugerencia al desarrollador
description.tchinese: 在遊戲開始界面，點擊反饋按鈕，向開發者提交一條BUG反饋或建議信息

description.italian: Completa tutti gli obiettivi

description.spanish: Obtener una victoria por reputación
